item.title: Building Development Environment with Docker
item.description: During development, you often hear “It worked on my machine!” Docker can solve this problem and help build consistent development environments.

item.title: Event-Driven Architecture and CQRS: Scalable System Design
item.description: Event-driven architecture (EDA) and CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation) have become core patterns for large-scale distributed systems in 2025 backend development. Let’s explore these essential patterns for modern applications requiring real-time data processing and high scalability with practical code examples.

item.title: Serverless Backend with Edge Computing: Next-Gen Architecture
item.description: The hottest backend development trend of 2025 is the convergence of serverless and edge computing. Learn how to minimize latency and maximize scalability with serverless functions running on globally distributed edge networks.
